original_text: “Is it a time for you yourselves to be living in your paneled houses, while this house remains a ruin?”
korean_text: 이 성전이 황폐하였거늘 너희가 이 때에 판벽한 집에 거주하는 것이 옳으냐

sentences.original_text: Is it a time for you yourselves
to be living in your paneled houses
while this house remains a ruin?
